data.text: @RitaJosephNYC @NYCCouncil Thank you for your leadership on this, Chair Joseph! Looking forward to working with you to realize this vision.

@Taibaah321 @RitaJosephNYC @NYCCouncil Whoa.. seriously?!  Class size matters org pushed for smaller classes... but the reality is that it's attained at a cost to students. The kids somehow always get the short end.

@RitaJosephNYC @NYCCouncil ENL students are being cheated out of an education. My school for example puts all ENL students in one class and makes sure their classroom teacher has an ESL license so they cheat the ENL child out of a second teacher in order to achieve lower class size in other grades.
@RitaJosephNYC @NYCCouncil Is it possible to view the testimony?
